data.title: Alan Rudolph Biography (1943-)
data.text:
Theatre, Film, and Television Biographies

John Romano to Waldo Salt

Alan Rudolph Biography (1943-)

Born December 18, 1943, in Los Angeles, CA; son of Oscar Rudolph (a television director); married Joyce (a photographer). Addresses: Office: Bart Walker, International Creative Management, 8942 Wilshire Blvd., Beverly Hills,CA 90211-1934.

Gender

Male

Occupation

Director, producer, writer, actor

Birth Details

December 18, 1943

Los Angeles, California
